cards.name: Absorbing Man
cards.ability: On Reveal: If the last card you played has an On Reveal, copy its text. (if it's in play)

cards.name: Astral Projection
cards.ability: On Reveal: Copy the text of an On Reveal card in your hand.

cards.name: Fantasticar
cards.ability: Activate: Give your End of Turn cards +2 Power.

cards.name: Galacta
cards.ability: Each turn, the first card you play at another location reveals with +2 Power.

cards.name: H.E.R.B.I.E.
cards.ability: Each turn this is in play, swap to a <mark>new Activate ability</mark> until one is used.

cards.name: H.E.R.B.I.E. Ability #1
cards.ability: Activate: Double this card's Power.

cards.name: H.E.R.B.I.E. Ability #2
cards.ability: Activate: Give 2 of your cards at each other location +1 Power.

cards.name: H.E.R.B.I.E. Ability #3
cards.ability: Activate: Create a Rock here. Set its Power to 4.

cards.name: H.E.R.B.I.E. Ability #4
cards.ability: Activate: Next turn, you get +2 Energy.

cards.name: Invisible Woman First Steps
cards.ability: Activate: This turn, your End of Turn abilities happen twice.

cards.name: Ironheart
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give 3 of your other cards +3 Power.

cards.name: Lockjaw
cards.ability: Activate: After you play your next card, swap it with a card in your deck.

cards.name: Misery
cards.ability: On Reveal: Repeat the On Reveal abilities of your other cards here, then destroy them.

cards.name: Mister Fantastic First Steps
cards.ability: End of Turn: Give a card in your hand -1 Cost or +2 Power.

cards.name: Moon Girl
cards.ability: On Reveal: Copy your hand.

cards.name: Professor X
cards.ability: Ongoing: Moving is the only way to add or remove a character from here.

cards.name: Reality Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: Replace this location with a new one.

cards.name: Red Guardian
cards.ability: On Reveal: Afflict the lowest-Power enemy card here with -2 Power and remove its text.

cards.name: Rhino
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add a <mark>Rock</mark> to your side of this location.

cards.name: Silk
cards.ability: After ANY card is played here, move this to another location.

cards.name: Space Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: Draw Thanos. Ongoing: Nothing can stop you from playing Thanos.

cards.name: Spider-Ham
cards.ability: Activate: Replace the text of a random character in your opponent’s hand with “oink!”

cards.name: Thanos
cards.ability: Game Start: Shuffle the six <mark>Infinity Stones</mark> into your deck.

cards.name: Time Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: Draw a card. Give Thanos -1 Cost.

cards.name: Viv Vision
cards.ability: End of Turn: Give each card in your hand +1 Power if you’re winning here. Otherwise, move this to another location.

cards.name: Wolfsbane
cards.ability: On Reveal: +2 Power for each other card you have here.

cards.name: Tao Mandala
cards.ability: On Reveal: Copy the text of one of your Ongoing cards here onto your other characters here.

cards.name: Galactus First Steps
cards.ability: My Herald is the next character I see you play. End of Turn: +3 Power if you're winning my Herald's location. (if in hand or in play)

cards.name: Invisible Woman First Steps
cards.ability: Activate: This turn, your End of Turn abilities happen twice.

cards.name: Red Shift
cards.ability: On Reveal: Discard the leftmost card in your hand to add a random card with the same Cost to your hand.

cards.name: Silver Surfer First Steps
cards.ability: End of Turn: If you're winning this location with an On Reveal card, copy its text.

cards.name: Stardust
cards.ability: Ongoing: Cards can’t be added to locations except by playing or moving them.

cards.name: Terrax the Tamer
cards.ability: On Reveal: For each location, shuffle a <mark>Rock</mark> into the losing player's deck.

cards.name: The Fallen One
cards.ability: On Reveal: Set your Max Energy equal to this card's Power.

items.title: Golden Gauntlet II
items: The event will be open to the public and will have 1,200 players. Visit Discord for more info.

items.title: High Voltage: Overdrive
items: Play to earn Volts to earn rewards and unlock new cards - Kid Omega and Cobra!

items.title: Collector's Vault
items: Exclusive variants available again for a limited time!

items.title: Sanctum Showdown
items: Your favorite mind-bending location dominating limited time game mode returns!

items.name: Infinity Ultron
changes: 5/8 - On Reveal: Add 2 of Ultron’s Stones to your hand.

items.name: Infinity Power Stone
changes: 3/2 - On Reveal: Double Infinity Ultron’s Power.

items.name: Infinity Reality Stone
changes: 3/1 - On Reveal: Add a Drone here. Set its Power to Infinity Ultron’s.

items.name: Infinity Time Stone
changes: 3/1 - On Reveal: Put a card from your hand here.

items.name: Infinity Space Stone
changes: 3/4 - On Reveal: Move the lowest-Power enemy card here to the location of Infinity Ultron.

items.name: Infinity Soul Stone
changes: 3/3 - On Reveal: For each of your full locations, give one of your cards there +2 Power.

items.name: Infinity Mind Stone
changes: 3/2 - Ongoing: Your On Reveal abilities here happen twice.

items.name: Giganto
changes: 6/14 - You can only play this at the left location.

items.name: Omega Red
changes: 4/5 - Ongoing: If you’re winning here, +3 Power to other locations.

items.name: Supergiant
changes: 4/5 - On Reveal: All cards played next turn don’t reveal until the game ends.

items.name: Spider-Ham
changes: 1/1 – On Reveal: Transform the leftmost card in your opponent’s hand into a Pig, keeping its Power and Cost.
1/2 – Activate: Replace the text of a random character in your opponent’s hand with “oink!”

items.name: Silk (Text Update)
changes: 2/5 – After ANY card is played here, this moves to another location..
2/5 – After ANY card is played here, move this to another location.

items.name: Moon Girl (Text Update)
changes: 4/5 – On Reveal: Duplicate your hand.
4/5 – On Reveal: Copy your hand.

items.name: Thanos
changes: 6/12 – Game Start: Draw Thanos and shuffle the six Infinity Stones into your deck.
6/12 – Game Start: Shuffle the six Infinity Stones into your deck.

changes: 1/2 – On Reveal: Draw a card. Ongoing: Nothing can stop you from playing or moving Thanos.
1/3 – On Reveal: Draw Thanos. Ongoing: Nothing can stop you from playing Thanos.

changes: 1/1 – On Reveal: Give Thanos -1 Cost.
1/1 – On Reveal: Draw a card. Give Thanos -1 Cost.

changes: 4/5 – Each turn, the first card you play at another location reveals with +3 Power.
4/6 – Each turn, the first card you play another location reveals with +2 Power.

changes: 3/3 – On Reveal: Afflict the lowest-Power enemy card here with -2 Power and remove its text.

changes: 4/8 – On Reveal: Repeat the On Reveal abilities of your other cards here, then destroy them.

changes: 5/2- Ongoing: Moving is the only way to add or remove a card from here.
